short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick and simple currency converter for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick and simple currency converter for Google Chrome.

Features:
✓ Converts between 31 currencies worldwide.
✓ Works with real-time exchange rates.
✓ Free to use.
✓ Open in a popup in Google Chrome.
✓ No ads.
✓ Simple and minimalistic design .
✓ 2 different design themes, light or dark.

This converter uses the Frankfurter API.
